class.name: VisualScriptFunctionState
class.brief_description: A Visual Script node representing a function state.
class.description: [VisualScriptFunctionState] is returned from [VisualScriptYield] and can be used to resume a paused function call.

method.name: connect_to_signal
method.description: Connects this [VisualScriptFunctionState] to a signal in the given object to automatically resume when it's emitted.

method.name: is_valid
method.description: Returns whether the function state is valid.

method.name: resume
method.description: Resumes the function to run from the point it was yielded.
